Articles.Content:
I watching Star Trek DS9 rerun on tv.

I always wondering why starfleet jut not lured Borg cubes to Gamma quadrant, so make Borg win the Dominion War for them

And then the Borg assimilate any other ships in the quadrant. Most of the Gamma Quadrant was unexplored at that time, and doubtless (somehow) bringing a cube there would doubtlessly result in the deaths of hundreds if not thousands of innocent undiscovered life forms.
Because afterward the Borg would occupy half of the galaxy.....and still have a grudge against humanity. You see the problem?
they will add your biological and technological distinctiveness to their own.
I know an old lady who swallowed a fly...
The Borg assimilating the Founders. Imagine a Borg 'adapting' to a threat by shape shifting. Now that would be a scary thought.

The Borg assimilating the Founders. Imagine a Borg 'adapting' to a threat by shape shifting. Now that would be a scary thought.

I'm thinking "Terminator 2"...
